name: Just Dance 2018
overview: Just Dance 2018 is a party game meant for dancing. It is the ninth game in the series and is the twenty-seventh dancing game by Ubisoft. The game features popular songs such as 24K Magic, Blue (Da Ba Dee), Chantaje, Despacito, Fight Club, Footloose, Shape of You, and Moana's "How Far I'll Go".
